_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: RimWorld - OpenWorld
author: wurmatron@wurmcraft.com
description:
Multiplayer Rimworld via Openworld by TastyLolipop

https://github.com/TastyLollipop/OpenWorld
https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2768146099

installation.script:
# Install Deps
apt install unzip
apt install wget
wget https://packages.microsoft.com/config/debian/11/packages-microsoft-prod.deb -O packages-microsoft-prod.deb
dpkg -i packages-microsoft-prod.deb
rm packages-microsoft-prod.deb
apt-get update
apt-get install -y aspnetcore-runtime-6.0

            
# Download Server
wget ${SERVER_DOWNLOAD} -P /mnt/server/
unzip /mnt/server/LinuxX64_SelfContained.zip -d /mnt/server
rm -rf /mnt/server/LinuxX64_SelfContained.zip

# Ready Server to ru
mv /mnt/server/'Open World Server' /mnt/server/OpenWorld-Server
chmod +x /mnt/server/OpenWorld-Server

variables.name: Server Download
variables.description: Link to download the most updated OpenWorld Mod,
